meta.note: Ancient-to-modern wisdom systems: Stoic, Vedic, Taoist, Pythagorean, African, Aboriginal.  Each entry links symbolic ratios to measurable practices via sofie_frequencies.json or sofie_motion.json.

systems.name: Nāda-Brahman
systems.essence: Cosmic sound as source of creation; microcosm (body) mirrors macrocosm (universe)
systems.mappingNote: Chest-voice Om ≈ 136 Hz (modern formant); links to Earth year Schumann 2nd harmonic

systems.name: Stoic Morning Reflection
systems.essence: Premeditatio malorum & dichotomy of control; prepare psyche for day
systems.mappingNote: Pythagorean tetraktys 4:3 ratio; modern 432 Hz tuning aligns with Earth-year 2nd harmonic

practice.method: 5 min journaling: ‘What is in my control?’ + 4-7-8 breath

systems.name: Wu Xing Qi Gong
systems.mappingNote: 288 Hz ≈ Earth-year 4th harmonic; 3:2 ratio links heart-small-intestine fire phase

systems.name: Music of the Spheres
systems.essence: Numerical ratios (1:2:3:4) align soul with cosmic order
systems.mappingNote: 256 Hz = modern middle-C; 2:1 octave mirrors Earth-year 1st harmonic

systems.name: Oriki Polyrhythm
systems.mappingNote: Master drum 288 Hz tone, cross-rhythm 192 Hz (3:2)

practice.method: Clap 3:2 pattern 5 min, vocal Oriki affirmation

systems.name: Dreamtime Songline
systems.mappingNote: 320 Hz ≈ Earth-year 3rd harmonic; 5:4 ratio evokes ‘home’ interval

practice.method: Walk 108 steps while humming 320 Hz drone, visualise land
